## 12E1

The prior of normal(0,1) will provide more shrinkage

## 12E2

Instead of 

a_group ~ Normal(0,10)

use 

a_group ~ normal(a,sigma)
a ~ (0,10)
sigma ~ cacuhy(0,1)
